ingredients: 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup butter, 2 large eggs, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1   +   1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1   +   3/4 teaspoons baking powder,   +   3/4 cup milk, 1 tablespoon lemon zest, 1 tablespoon lemon juice
nutrition: Total Fat 11g 14%, Saturated Fat 6g 32%, Cholesterol 63mg 21%, Sodium 173mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 36g 13%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 21g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 2mg 8%, Calcium 81mg 6%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 68mg 1%
